table_caption: Demographic and clinical characteristics of participants
table_foot: AD, Alzheimer's dementia; K‐GDS, Korean Geriatric Depression Scales; MCI, Mild cognitive impairment; HC, Healthy control; CDR, Clinical Dementia Rating; MMSE, Mini‐Mental State Examination.As for the scores of CERAD‐K cognitive test and K‐GDS, complete data were available for 38 AD patients, 64 MCI patients, and 30 HCs, and one or more data were not available for the remaining subjects.aIndicates significance compared to HC group (p < .05).bIndicates significance compared to MCI group (p < .05).cWelch's ANOVA with Games‐Howell post hoc test. Otherwise, ANOVA with Tukey's post hoc test.
